author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Taking advantage of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39993 we can actually use `EvFFEDExcluder` instead of `EvFFEDSelector` for `rawPrimeDataRepacker`, allowing for a more compact set of FEDs to exclude in the 2018 RAW' worklflow defined in PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39863, following up on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39863#discussion_r1006485795
 
#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 140.58 -t 4 -j 8 --ibeos` runs fine.


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Possibly to 12_5_X.
title: use `EvFFEDExcluder` instead of `EvFFEDSelector` for `rawPrimeDataRepacker`
